        pf_height - The height of the playing field
        player - The player object
        bricks - The level's bricks
        brickConfigurations - The game's brick configurations

        Returns:

      • resolveCollision

        public int resolveCollision(Brick brick)
        Resolve a collision between a shot and a brick
        Parameters:
        brick - The brick to check for a collision with
        Returns:
        The score generated by hitting the brick, if we hit the brick. If not is 0 returned.
